tasks.title: Fix SQL injection in search endpoint
tasks.description: The /api/search endpoint is vulnerable to SQL injection. User input is concatenated directly into the query string. Replace with parameterized queries.
acceptance_criteria: Input with SQL special characters does not cause errors
No raw SQL string concatenation in codebase

tasks.title: Fix pagination returning duplicate items
tasks.description: When paginating through results, some items appear on multiple pages. Root cause: ORDER BY uses non-unique field. Add secondary sort by id.
acceptance_criteria: ORDER BY includes id as tiebreaker

tasks.title: Fix mobile menu not closing after navigation
tasks.description: On mobile devices, the hamburger menu stays open after clicking a link. It should close automatically when navigating to a new page.
acceptance_criteria: Menu closes after clicking any nav link
Menu can still be toggled open/closed manually
Works on iOS Safari and Android Chrome
